contents.text: Welcome to RocketSpace in San Francisco, where we provide speed and direction to the world’s top tech startups and corporate innovators.
For workspace bookings and tour scheduling, press 1.
To reserve a dedicated desk, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our dedicated desk reservations team.

navigationGoals: Book a dedicated desk at RocketSpace San Francisco for next month.
I’m a veteran entrepreneur and I want to reserve a dedicated desk at your San Francisco location
I'd like to provision a dedicated workstation with 24/7 secure access and gigabit ethernet connectivity starting next week.
I need to reserve a dedicated desk for the coming month and ask about accessible amenities.
I’d like to reserve a dedicated desk for my research work next month.

contents.text: To book a private office, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our private office bookings team.

navigationGoals: Reserve a private office at RocketSpace SF starting in August.
I’m a veteran and need to book a private office at RocketSpace SF for my upcoming project
I need to reserve a three-person private office suite with high-throughput network and managed firewall support for an upcoming client workshop.
I’d like to book a private office for a short-term stay and arrange a tour of the space.
I need to book a private office for a group study session.

contents.text: For membership and billing inquiries, press 2.
For new membership plans and pricing, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our membership information team.

navigationGoals: Get details on RocketSpace membership plans and pricing.
As a veteran business owner, I’d like details on your new membership plans and pricing
I want to review the new membership tier architectures, pricing models, and associated SLA commitments.
I want to learn about your membership plans and pricing, especially any senior discounts.
I want details on membership plans and pricing to pick the right option.

contents.text: For billing and invoice support, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our billing support specialists.

navigationGoals: Clarify a recent charge on my RocketSpace billing statement.
I’m a veteran member and need help resolving an issue on my latest billing invoice
I need a comprehensive ledger for last month's billing cycle, including individual invoice IDs and cost-center allocations.
I need help understanding my latest invoice and resolving a billing question.
I have questions about my latest billing invoice and need support.
